original_text: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthalhites: of Becher, the family of the Bachrites: of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.
korean_text: 에브라임 자손의 종족들은 이러하니 수델라에게서 난 수델라 종족과 베겔에게서 난 베겔 종족과 다한에게서 난 다한 종족이며

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families:
of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthalhites:
of Becher, the family of the Bachrites:
of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.
